attributes.action: Ask Government to grant 3 year interest free tax loans.
attributes.additional_details: This would help businesses who are unable to get bank support and whose post coronavirus income is going to be directly affected by the pandemic.
attributes.background: Grant 3 year interest free tax loans to individuals and companies for their 2019/20 liabilities falling due before 31 March 2021.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one or more of these petitions instead:

Impose an income tax holiday for UK tax payers during the Coronavirus crisis.: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304905

Issue a secondary grant payment for SBRR recipients and rate-paying businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317071 

 

Given the current situation suspend all Business Rates now to all business: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305899

Extend £10,000 small business grant to SMEs that do not have a property: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304161 

 

Exempt businesses whose offices have closed due to Covid-19 from business rates: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313407
